name: Solar Panels CBM
description: Installed on your back is a set of retractable solar panels.  When in direct sunlight, they will automatically deploy and slowly recharge your power level.

name: Precision Solderers CBM
description: A set of tiny electronics tools, including soldering irons and wire cutters.  They serve no purpose on their own, but are required for crafting bionics.

name: Deployable Grenade Launcher CBM
description: A small, folding tube that attaches to your right arm.  Once implanted, it can serve as a portable, integrated tool for firing 40mm grenades and canisters.

name: Linguistic Coprocessor CBM
description: A microcomputer installed into the left hemisphere of your brain to increase the speed that it processes language.  When installed, it provides a passive boost to reading speed.

name: Dopamine Stimulators CBM
description: A set of tiny bionic nerve stimulators that install into the reward center of your brain.  When run with bionic power, it periodically releases a hit of dopamine and other reward chemicals, inducing a state of euphoria and suppressing fear.

name: Lightning Rod CBM
description: A thick and superconductive insulated metal rod that extends down the length of your arm and replaces your hand with something alike to a metal gauntlet.  While active, you raise the arm towards the sky, drawing lightning strikes from the heavens into yourself.

name: Hydrophobic Epidermis CBM
description: Inside this metal box is a series of peach-colored synthetic fabric strips folded onto each other.  When pressed into the skin, they meld with it and alter it at the microscopic level before dissolving, making it completely waterproof.

name: Synthetic Heart CBM
description: This mechanical pump is meant to replace your heart, and functions off of your body heat, requiring no power on its own.  It operates much more safely and efficiently than a normal human heart, boosting stamina regeneration and allowing open wounds to rapidly clot to prevent blood loss.

name: Leukocyte Dispatcher CBM
description: A small unit that augments your nervous system and provides immediate immune response to foreign agents.  While powered, this will cleanse you of any external invaders, including disease, infection, and parasites.

name: Volonium Skeletal Bracing CBM
description: This add-on upgrade to the Titanium Skeletal Bracing CBM further increases carrying weight by a tremendous amount using an ultra-strength synthetic alloy.  It requires its precursor to be installed first.

name: Plasma Blade CBM
description: This ultra-advanced bionic is lined with volonium heatsinks and powerful magnetic field projectors.  While active, it creates a superheated blade of plasma at a breathtaking power cost.

name: Acoustic Pulverizers CBM
description: Two large, reinforced sound emitters, meant to be embedded into the palm.  When provided with bionic power, they can be used to emit staggered bursts of intense sound capable of breaking down solid barriers.
